title: HDTV.Calibration.Wizard.DVDR.2005
description:
Calibrate Your High Definition TV to Professional ISF Standards
The Monster/ISF HDTV Calibration Wizard DVD is the next best thing to hiring a costly technician to visit your home. The Calibration Wizard uses easy to use live video shots to help you calibrate your TV without complicated test patterns. You will be amazed at the better detail, more realistic picture quality and more accurate black levels and contrast. 

C H A P T E R S :
1. Introduction From The Head Monster 10th Anniversary ISF/Monster
2. How This DVD Will Make Every Other DVD Better!
3. How Black are Your Blacks?
4. How Bright are Your Whites?
5. Are Your Pictures Colorful Enough or Way Too Colorful?
6. Is Your TV Sharp?
7. Am I Too Fat?
8. Time to Enjoy Your TV
9. Are You Well Connected and Properly Powered?

narrated by Jenna Drey With bonus musicvideo in WMV HD with 7.1 digital audio.
